item.title: Wireless Charging Station, 3 in 1 Wireless Charger Compatible with iPhone 14/13/12/11/Pro/Max/SE/XS/XR/X/8 Plus/8, Fast Wireless Charging Stand Dock for Apple Watch Series & Airpods(with Adapter)
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Price: (as of – Details) 【Upgrade 3 in 1 Wireless Charging Station】Wireless Charging Station for Apple products,Saves your costs.Fast 3 in 1 charging station is equal to one charging station for iWatch, one Phone charging stand, 1 charging dock for AirPods. Wide compatibility to cover all IOS devices, Compatible with iPhone 14/14 Pro/14 Pro Max/13/13 ... Read more
item.content:encoded:
Price: $59.99 - $36.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 08:57:03 UTC – Details)



【Upgrade 3 in 1 Wireless Charging Station】Wireless Charging Station for Apple products,Saves your costs.Fast 3 in 1 charging station is equal to one charging station for iWatch, one Phone charging stand, 1 charging dock for AirPods. Wide compatibility to cover all IOS devices, Compatible with iPhone 14/14 Pro/14 Pro Max/13/13 Pro/13 Pro Max/13 mini/12/12 Pro/12 Pro Max/12 mini/11/11 Pro/11 Pro Max/XS/XR/XS MAX/X/8/8Plus & iWatch SE/6/5/4/3/2 & AirPods Pro/3/2/1. A must device for apple fans.
【Simplify Charging,Simplified Life】Only need one cable to charge for iphone, apple watch and airpods simultaneously, bring you an effortless charging experience, no more tangled cords trouble.Also, easy to find the “sweet spot” to charge, just simply place your phone on the stand and this wireless charger stand will do the rest. The Charging station for multiple devices apple is very suitable as a Christmas gift,Thanksgiving gift or birthday gift for friends.
【Intelligent Protection&Sleep Friendly Charging Pad】Our wireless charging stand with lightweight design, space saving,base with anti-slip silicone design so that the charger will not move or flip, to ensure that your phone is protected when charging; Besides, features a blue LED indicator when charging. If place this on nightstand, the blue light is a soft and not dazzing, virtually won’t lights up the entire room, no need to worry that it will prevent your sleep from being affected.
【What You Will Get】Our package includes 1* Wireless Charger iPhone,1*18W wall adapter,1*USB-C Charging Cable,1*User Manual,Worry-free 24-Month Warranty.One device allows you to have a clean desk and a beautiful smile,Please rest assured of the quality of our products that every product we send to you has gone through a series of quality inspection procedures. if you have any question on this wireless iphone charger, please contact us we will offer you a best solution within 24 hours.

4.5
Price: $59.99 - $36.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 08:57:03 UTC – Details)

Warranty & Support

Product Warranty: For warranty information about this product, please click here

Price: $24.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 04:25:05 UTC – Details)

Product Description

Upoy Charging Hub [New Releases]

–Overview:

4 USB-A + 2 USB-C fast charging ports, 5V-8A, 45W charger adapter, compatible with most kinds of electronic gadgets.

–Features:

“Lightweight”, “space saver”, “versatile”, “compact”, “fast charging”, “portable”, “kawaii”.

–Scenarios:

travel, cruise, desk accessories.

desktop cable management.

gifts for men, women, girls, boys.

If you are hesitating which charger you need…

Electronic Gadgets&Apple Accessories

apple chargers for iphone

Charging station for multiple devices apple, usb power strip supports 6 devices at same time!

charger for apple watch

Usb wall charger for apple watch, compatible with usb-a and usb-c charging cord, a single charging adapter does not need to be replaced!

chargers for Ipad

Ipad charging station fast charging, no matter for c port or lightning port, upoy multi usb port charger does the job!

Charger for Airpods

Charging blocks for all kinds of airpods, No need to take off your airpods case, automatically stop while full charging!

Personal charging hub cruise essentials: Charging tower with 4 usb-a and 2 usb-c ports, glossy shell&small footprint; travel accessories for men, women, teens.
Cell phone chargers & power adapters: Charger block total 8A, USB adapter compatible 5W/10W/15W/20W, kawaii desk accessories for Iphone/Samsung.
Universal chargers for multi electronics: Integrated charging accessories for Smart Phone, Tablet, Headphone, Kindle, Oculus, Gaming Controller and more.
Desktop cable management: Charging station 6 ports with 5 ft power cord; Compact, Lightweight, Space saving, Portable, Versatile, USB charging hub for 6 devices simultaneously.
Charging dock with multiple protection: Built-in smart IC against overload, overvoltage, over-temperature, over-charge and short circuits.

Previous page

  2. Upoy is a young and creative brand into electronic gadgets.

    With a group of funny people and a professional supply chain, our vision is to bring world a serie of products with “Unique Style”, “Great Value”, “Reliable Quality”.

    If you also have a restless soul, welcome to join us on the road of exploration.

Product Description

Charging Station Organizer

Feelek aims to protect you and your device safety

All our products were approved by CE FCC Rohs. If you have any questions, please Contact Feelek store Through Amazon.

Universally compatible with iOS & Android cell phones, tablets, and other USB devices, Note please use the correct corresponding USB charging cables! We supply 3 x IOS cables,2 x Micro USB cables, 1 x Type-C

Specification:

Item Size: 7.9″x4.5″x2.9″

Input: 100-240V AC 50-60Hz

Output: 5V DC 8A (max)

Output Current Per Port: 0~2.4A(Intelligent Identification)

Power Cord: 4.9ft/1.5m

Package Included:

1 x 6-port charging station

1 x power cord

1 x user’s manual

3 x IOS cables

2 x 8″ micro USB cable

1 x 8″ type C cable

charging stations for electronics

Charging Station Organizer

Package list √ Charging station*1 √ Power cord*1 √ User Manual*1 √ USB charging cables*6 Input: 100-240V~50-60Hz USB Port Output: 5V~2.4A More Powerful：

√Wide voltage and wide frequency, applicable worldwide

√The energetic and powerful multi-port USB charging station will charge your multiple devices at the same time at a fast speed

Desktop Organizer：

Feelek charging station has 40W(max） power output for 6 ports, the USB strip charging station is compatible with smartphones, iPhone, iPad Tablets, Galaxy, E-reader, power bank, Bluetooth earphone, or most other 5V USB-charged devices.

Product Safety Features：

Feelek charging station is made of ABS+PC fireproof material, V0 grade fireproof.

Our charging station organizer provides surge protection, short circuit prevention, and temperature control. Compatible with USB C Charger,iPhone charger, and Type C charger

Desk Charging Station Thermostat Smart Chip Control

Feelek’s desk charging station’s high-end intelligent control improves charging efficiency. Again, charging stations for electronics increases stability protects batteries, and extends the life

Charging Station High-Quality Pure Copper Wire Core

Our charging station for most devices’ pure copper wire transmission minimizes the current loss during charging.

Item Specifications

Feelek charging station baffle is 0.79 inches wide x 1.18 inches Height

The charging station has a fixed baffle, which has high strength and is not easy to break and deform compared with the detachable baffle

Charging Stations for Electronics

99% Compatibility:The charging station include 6 cables. Charging station for multiple devices compatible with iphone 12, 11,11Pro, XS, XS Max, XR, X, SE, 8, 8 Plus, 7, 7 Plus, Ipads, Samsung Galaxy S10, S10Plus, S9, S8, iPad, iPad Pro, iPad Air, iPad Mini, iPod.USB charger compatible AirPods series, iPhone Samsung Google Pixel and other smart phones, tablets, music players and more
6-in-1 Charging Station: This charging station for multiple devices compatible include 【3*IOS cables,2*Micro USB cable, 1*Type-C cable 】. The Charging Station will all your needs of charging different devices’ type through one outlet. Feelek’s charging station for multiple devices could compatible with apple charging station,usb charging station. No more annoyance of searching for charging cords everywhere
Fast & Smart Charge: Feelek’s charging station has 6-port fast charger dock.The charging station for multiple devices will charge your cell phone and tablets up to 85% faster than other devices offering 2.0 amps or less; our charging station for multiple devices recognize your devices and deliver the amp that it needs
Safety & Organized： Feelek charging statio‘s Intelligent protection system safeguards your device from overheat, overcharge and more risks.The charging station for multiple devices will offer 7.2A, even if your devices’ total amps exceeded the current. This charging station also works well. Sturdy dividers and wide spacing between them easily supports phone or tablet of thick cases. keep your space nicely organized on nightstand, kitchen counter, office tabletop, classroom and more
Lifetime & Customer Care： This charging station for multiple devices are manufactured under strict quality standards to offer our customers best experience. For any problem, you can contact us and we will reply you immediately to solve all of your worry. Charging Stations have ETL, FCC, CE and RoHs certifications. Totally no risk of you!
